website_summaries.verdict: This electric callus remover is powerful, waterproof, and safe to use on wet or dry feet.
pros: The roller is angled so it’s easier to handle while removing calluses
The USB charging cable makes it convenient to charge anywhere
The unit runs continuously for 80 minutes when fully charged
cons: Some users say the charge doesn’t always hold as long as it should

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: wow I previously had the pedi bunny - but i broke it and needed a new one so I found this one and love it even more! It’s also wet dry so it’s great after a shower. It is powerful and comes with the charger cord that plugs into a usb outlet. The roller is wider than the previous brand I had, it also it angled very nice and feels comfortable in your hand. It’s a great price and great quality. I would recommend to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: JanLynn

customer_reviews.title: Update:  pretty happy with this product.  The first use and product only lasted 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Update: After giving this product a full charge, it lasted for as long as I needed it to work on both my feet and still remained with plenty of charge. I’m pretty happy with how well it worked on my thick calluses. I will update review if after I charge this completely it lasts longer than 5 minutes before requiring another charge. The product is easy to use. I wish the was a super-coarse roller for my feet, but I will try again with this coarse roller. The good thing is it would be very difficult to hurt yourself or take too much off because the skin comes off so gradually.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Torbert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome results and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm impressed. I didn't have high hopes for this considering the price. I have averagely callused feet and my heels are prone to cracking. This electric file is so easy to use and not scary at all. I was concerned I would take off to much skin by accident. The file turns itself off if you push too hard, so it would be very hard to hurt yourself. It is more like a foot sander, very little dead skin comes off at a time. Excellent results after one 10 minute session. Very impressed, it is well worth the money. It's my new go-to pedicure tool!
customer_reviews.author: snwbordrgrl

customer_reviews.title: MiroPure stood behind their product
customer_reviews.text: I used this device multiple times over the last10 months and was fully satisfied with the results it produced. Unfortunately, the run time decreased to only 5 minutes after months of more than adequate run time. I went to the MiroPure web site and their on-line customer support representative, Diamond, confirmed I had a defective unit and offered to replace for free it under the 1 year warranty that comes with it. I look forward to receiving my replacement device.
customer_reviews.author: Kim E

customer_reviews.title: Great little foot file.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good little file for smoothing rough skin on feet. I like to go barefoot in the summer so my feet get a lot of wear and tear. This file smooths them out very nicely. It says you can use it wet or dry, but I don't find it works very well wet. I always make sure my feet are completely dry before using. They claim you can use it 80 times before having to recharge, but I find that laughable. Maybe it's a typo and they meant 8, which is more like it. Not a problem, though. It's easy enough to recharge. All in all, I'm very happy with this file.
customer_reviews.author: cooknot801

customer_reviews.title: File the day away!
customer_reviews.text: Lavender and teal are my favorite colors. I already own on of the competitor's electric foot filers in blue. I jumped on this one because it's a bright shade of teal and a pretty color will make the chore of scrubbing off dead skin more pleasurable. Works just as well as the name brand filer. This filer is sleeker in design also. The only reason I gave it only 4 stars is because I couldn't find a link to order refills. However, the other brand's refills actually fit so do not hesitate to give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Murillo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!! A MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely INCREDIBLE product!! Been using for about a week now and has already saved my feet from painful cracks, that were so bad I used to cry over, and horrid roughness. I Miro both feet thoroughly, slather petroleum jelly on my feet afterwards, and then throw on a pair of cotton socks overnight. Seriously the best treatment EVER. Would recommend to anyone/everyone who struggles with severely cracked feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient easy to grip and control callus remover
customer_reviews.text: This callus remover is extremely convenient to use in the shower. It is easy to grip and control even when covered in shower gel. I find the power to be just right - too much pressure causes it to stall before it does serious damage. The battery life is adequate and the charge level indicator is easy to see. I would give 5 stars, except the first one I purchased had an internal loose connection. Promptly replaced by Amazon. No problems with the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: IanC

customer_reviews.title: Wow- POWER
customer_reviews.text: Wow this has some power. I had been using a different brand for the past couple of years and it finally broke down. I am almost glad it did because I had to order replacement. This one has so MUCH MORE power. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Old Lady 57

customer_reviews.title: Callus remover
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome I have calluses on my feet my daughter has calluses on her feet but this machine took the calluses right off our feet made our feet nice and soft. It's real easy to use all you have to do is turn it on it comes pre-charged the charge doesn't last long so you'll definitely have to charge it up for 2 hours to get it from the red light to the green light but I will tell you this it's definitely a product you want I would definitely recommend this to anybody who has calluses or anything like that on there feet
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fast smooth results in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping around for a callus remover since I am constantly on my feet and especially since the change of weather the heel and sides of my feet develop dry patches after trying this product it was so easy to use with fast results I could see the dead skin peeling away with no hassle. After just a few minutes of massaging my feet with the file I was so impressed to how soft my feet looked and felt once seeing the dry cracks sand off. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Cantillo

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of those all time great purchases. It’s actually fun to use and very effective. So rewarding to have baby soft skin on my feet after using it. In fact, it’s such a great product that after showing it to three people in my family, each one of them bought one for themselves. Great that it’s rechargeable and waterproof, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bg77

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it is pressure sensitive, so don't press too hard. However, I can say my feet felt very smooth and you saw why (from the old skin coming off). My major complaint is, the battery life. It is ridiculously short. Make sure to read the instructions before charging. Maybe that was my fault or maybe the battery is not good, or my battery is from a bad batch. However, the design is easy to hold and use but the battery. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazonista

customer_reviews.title: Great product, makes foot care simple!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective product--removes even the toughest calluses! Super easy to use with USB charger too.
customer_reviews.author: Creepingtime

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty. It's nice that it comes with an extra head. I like that it's rechargeable and that it has a light that indicates when you are pressing too hard. The problem is that you cannot press down hard enough to do much good because the motor isn't powerful enough. It will take a bit of dead skin off if you soak your feet long enough but you are better off just getting a plain pumice stone.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It works... And for the price that’s enough
customer_reviews.text: It works, which is most important. For the price, I won’t be overly critical because you get what you pay for. My complaint is it’s a bit loud and sounds like a cheap RC car. But the objective is to remove dead skin, and that it does.... caution if you use dry, it produces a cloud of dead skin flying everywhere (which I would imagine this is the case with every motorized pedicure file).
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I use the coarser one for the severe area and the finer one for sensitive area
customer_reviews.text: This electronic foot filer has really changed my routine. I used to file the dead skins off my heel manually. It was never a pleasant experience. Now with the help of this waterproof machine, archiving baby soft heel has become a enjoyable step. There two rollers come with the package. I use the coarser one for the severe area and the finer one for sensitive area. Since the machine is waterproof, I just left it in the shower and use it whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I am shocked
customer_reviews.text: By how well this worked. My feet are so soft now. It came in a really nice box, with an extra file, and a brush to clean it. I love that it's rechargeable. It's also got lights letting you know if the battery is charged or getting low. I feel like the battery life might not be great, seemed to be dying by the end of my second foot, but I'm going to let it charge and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vandenberghe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t recharge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tens last year, it worked very well. I tried to recharge it for the last 3 days and find it won’t recharge. I tried different plug, outlet and hubs and new lines. I am very disappointed, more money down the drain with inferior products. I found another plug and I was able to charge it..it works well now!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Kalik

customer_reviews.title: Better than other leading brand files
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’ve tried two other brands of foot files that are similar, both are leading brands, and I will say this one is the best I’ve used, the fact that it charges so fast and lasts so long makes it worth the money, but it also has a really pretty button and nice lightweight design, it works so well, the power is great and it does last. Recharging is so easy
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Schwerdtfeger

customer_reviews.title: No more cracked heels!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about ordering this. There was a more expensive one, and I just don't trust reviews in general. But this thing is great. I didn't believe it would have the power for my hard callouses. I thought it would break down, or just not have the motor to power through it. Have no fear. This thing is powerful. My feet are baby-soft and I'm super happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PreferNoToSay

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly in wet and dry conditions
customer_reviews.text: My feet were extremely dry and full of dead skin. After using this pedicure set the changes were amazing! It doesn't need to be connected to electricity so it allows you to use it anywhere. The sandpaper roller is strong to eliminate any callus or impurity but at the same time it is gentle avoiding damage to the skin. It is important to use moisturizer after the pedicure or the results will not be the same. With this product, you can see improvements in the feet from the first use. Good relation price-quality
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I get callouses on the bottom of my feet frequently. It is so nice to have a unit that can be used anywhere. It is not bulky. It does an excellent job of shaving away the dead skin. I can lightly shave off the dead skin on top of a corn. It love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept but it doesn't really work the way i thought it would. if you press a bit harder it just stops turning/working. It does get a thin layer of the dry skin- if you don't need it for rough dry skin then it will work for you. Also i used it twice and needed to charge it already. I like the look and design of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got me feet so smooth I ..............
customer_reviews.text: I love it , works so good, got my feet so smooth my feet slipped out from under me on carpeted steps . I slid down 5 steps on my butt & got a nasty rug burn on my arm. Lol not saying the smooth feet is a bad thing though, It’s good!!! Glad I bought it & love that it’s rechargeable! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Constantly needs to be charged, but excellent results!!
customer_reviews.text: This product REALLY does the trick for keeping your feet smooth and silky, and I love that I can just keep it in the shower and use it in there! The ONLY downside of it is that the charge barely lasts - basically you have to re-charge it every 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Initially it seemed to be a helpful device. Until I tried it--twice. It showed it charged the first time I plugged it in very quickly. It worked nicely for maybe 5 minutes before it died. Hoping it was just a fluke I tried again the next day. It took a little longer to charge this time but again quickly died. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker
customer_reviews.text: This foot file is a miracle worker for me. My heels were a little rough but after using the foot file they are now very smooth which is something that I have been trying to accomplish for a while by using different types of lotions. I am very, very pleased with my purchase and I now want to buy another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Shunka36

customer_reviews.title: This really works, quickly and without any pain or discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: Just got my pedicure foot file today and I already love it. My heels were calloused and cracked and this has already mad a huge difference in the first use. At first, I thought the motor wasn't strong enough, but it takes the dead skin off with just a light touch. I am pleased with the purchase and wish I had tried it sooner. I might purchase additional ones as gifts for my family.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Good deal UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It worked like a dream! Also their customer service is amazing. Update on this product. It died on me. It wouldn't hold a charge or power on. I've had it for less than 2 years and it no longer works. Such a disappointment since it worked so well when I first got it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I used another brand of these for years and thought I could not beat it. Then I ordered this one. WOW. Much better! It's much stronger, it does not stop when it's pushed down on (if you've used other brands, you know what i am saying) and the charger saves a TON in batteries. I have not used in the shower. But dry? No brainer. This thing is the bomb. Huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Yet another Whitney

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect much from this product but I am very surprised the product has worked excellent for me! I had calluses on the heels of my feet and to my surprise, this has removed them. I am very pleased with this product! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Update: MicroPure reached out to me and sent a replacement. Replacement works fine and customer service is A+. It worked very well until one day it just stopped spinning. I used it about 2 times a week and it lasted 3 months. Too bed as I really liked the product initially.
customer_reviews.author: Zgabeartza Iftode

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FILE
customer_reviews.text: I have owned dozens of foot files over the years and this one is my favorite of them all. I recently purchased a second one to have on hand because my kids and husband are always stealing mine
customer_reviews.author: Rednckmama

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: My feet were so dry and cracked. This product really help smooth it out. I also liked that you can use it both wet and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Worst Purchase Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The producr failed to recharge and customer Support was uncaring and refused to replace the defective unit. Read all the other reviews where the product failed to recharge or be operable after the first use. Don't waste your money on this product! Mark Blai
customer_reviews.author: M. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a foot file and was reading the reviews and this one seemed mixed.. But it’s the best foot file I’ve ever owned! My feet are so soft after one use. It came charged and I used it immediately. You can use it in the shower too which is a time saver for me. Don’t buy an expensive foot file it’s not worth it. This foot file is number 1.
customer_reviews.author: danielle t

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. Gets the job done in a fraction of the time of other products
customer_reviews.author: Kells79

customer_reviews.title: No power- doesn’t charge!
customer_reviews.text: So many better products available. It’s cute but DOES NOT WORK! Doesn’t hold a charge and even when plugged is not substantial ...
customer_reviews.author: casamom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesnt last to do both feet Cant seem to find extra rolls It does the job and saves money Recommend soaking feet in warm water before using it so its easier and also using a towel under for easy clean up. No need for paying in my case $30.00 ever other week. Money saver. Ill be buying another one to be able to finish my feet sooner instead of waiting to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Yazarhet

customer_reviews.title: No bueno!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I'm debating whether or not to send it back. I feel bad returning it bc I've used it. Well, tried to anyway. It has very little power, even fully charged. This is the first time I've ever gotten one of these and I am NOT pleased with this brand! I'm irritated that there were 4.4 stars when I looked at the reviews! Bc, honestly I completely disagree with that!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Battery will not charge
customer_reviews.text: The product was working fine. I received it in February, 2019; however I have had it for 5 months and it will no longer charge so I am disappointed that it did not last longer. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David T. Shuping

customer_reviews.title: Great Foot File
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot file I have tried. I love the fact of not worrying about buying batteries.You can use it on dry or wet feet.It left my feet soft and smooth,I followed up with a foot cream (o’keeffe’s healthy feet).My feet had callouses,dry skin that was flaky and rough and this foot file is just what I needed and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sharonda S.

customer_reviews.title: I didnt like it
customer_reviews.text: Used products like this before and its loud it's like your drilling,hardly any power like its struggling ,as soon as you press lightly on it the wheel stops,not sure what people are talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty feet in minutes
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tool! Easy to hold and move around. Easy to recharge. The only thing I'm a little curious about each time I use it is... couldn't they have found a better location for the on/off button? It just seems awkward sometimes. Nonetheless, I love it and use it often. My feet have never been smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Doodlemutt

customer_reviews.title: Love this gizmo
customer_reviews.text: At age 79 I got my first callus on the side of my left foot. It felt like I had a stone in my shoe. I wanted to resolve the issue ASAP and ordered this gizmo that removed the callus most efficiently now my feet are happy again
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Carry

customer_reviews.title: A waste.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. This is my second one. The first stopped taking a charge after less than a year. This one would charge again after 3 uses. No more.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Dies quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have it 3 stars because of how fast it dies. I gave it a full charge and only used it for 5 min before it died again. It works but the battery life is no good. But maybe I got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J

customer_reviews.title: Really Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Much more than expected after using a similar unit with AAA cells. Use care regarding the pressure you apply until you are accustomed to the unit. The dead skin on the back of my heals is history.
customer_reviews.author: John Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: This product good if you have very rough heels. My problem are dry skin around my toes and this product doesn’t work for this case. I’m going to give It to my sister
customer_reviews.author: h3aven

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome product value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing I used it the moment I got it and it really worked I was so surprised and satisfied with my purchase. It’s so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimeisha Reid

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product! I’m very happy with my purchase! I definitely recommend it For the price. I only wish it were stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this, so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, just had a baby so it’s hard for me to sneak out for an expensive pedicure. This did the trick on removing the tougher skin on my big toe and the heels of my feet. I hate having calloused feet, especially in the summer. This was super easy to use and came charged! Hopefully this product keeps being awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My unit does not hold a charge. I have to keep it plugged in to use. It does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: C2

customer_reviews.title: Good for light use.
customer_reviews.text: It works well other than battery life. The battery worked great at first, now it only lasts for about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Comes
customer_reviews.text: Best foot file product I’ve ever used. Powerful motor so thatt doesn’t continually stop. Love that it has corase and fine head in the package and brush for cleaning and it can be used dry or underwater. I liked mine so much I sent one to my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Plano3913

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to get this? It works so well. Easy usb charging. Easy use. Baby soft feet
customer_reviews.author: happyfitmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I used similar products before. I like the fact that you can charge it without having to use batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy-Q

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Price is very good for this product. Very well made. Strong item.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T. Baker

customer_reviews.title: This product is not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 4-5 times after I bought this without any problems. Then it won't hold it's charge or it won't charge at all. I tried to contact customer service by email, phone and through Facebook without any response. Finally I bought another product. Before you buy this product think again.
customer_reviews.author: shopy1

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ones out in the market
customer_reviews.text: The pedicure foot file is beyond amazing! We have used other models but nothing beats this one. Yes it’s a little more pricey than the ones available outside but this one has been working so well on for years!
customer_reviews.author: Sonal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foot file! I really love that it is 100% waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ladies this is a must buy. I’ve tried so many different ones and this one works without breaking the bank. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Didnt hold a charge!
customer_reviews.text: It wouldnt hold a charge.kind of flimsily made , for the price. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Fenway

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, I am blown away by the power and the quality. I highly recommend to anyone whose feet needs some TLC.
customer_reviews.author: jason hollander

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I’ve found it to be okay. It wasn’t able to make my heels perfect, but it’s helpful. I’m too sensitive skinned to use it for more than a short while.
customer_reviews.author: MorningHaze

customer_reviews.title: Smooth feet.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this grounds without pain. I have deep foot, with hyper pain, but this doesn't seem to be a problem. Gets rid of the callous with comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kath Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are of using product on my left foot only ...
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are of using product on my left foot only for three days in a row (I wanted to see the difference). It needs to be charged now but hopefully will continue to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Micro pure foot file
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use it is waterproof and rechargeable great product
customer_reviews.author: Betty Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage. Plugged in to charge and it will not hold charge at all. We tried all the common things that could be a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Welk

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: This is a updated review at first I wasn’t 100% satisfied with the product, the seller contacted me and refunded my money. It’s a good product just was expecting something a little different.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa bacon

customer_reviews.title: Unreal!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to try this! I’ve had two particularly bad calluses on my right foot for a long time, and they hurt. This product handled them in 2 minutes. I have a completely different foot than I did just a few minutes ago! Cannot reccomend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This foot file makes my feet feel soft again. I love being bare footed all the time so my feet tend to be rough and dry but this helps a lot. I like the fact the it is waterproof and you can also recharge it. It comes with an additional file and they are really easy to switch. I would really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product in the beginning but it has now stopped working. It still turns on and spins but as soon as you put any pressure on it it stops working. It was nice while it lasted:)
customer_reviews.author: bsnwi

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is Bad
customer_reviews.text: Battery only lasted a little bit over a year. Now its junk.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It helps my feet feel so smooth.. helps with dead skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and absolutely love it! I used it for the first time tonight and ALREADY my feet are so soft! It is easy to use and easy to charge! The instructions explain everything great! I was surprised because I didn’t expect it to work that good! I highly recommend this product!! I’m very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ensey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It’s easy to hold and works well. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: mpurple

customer_reviews.title: Removes callous easily
customer_reviews.text: I like the whole item. I like the way it feels and that it is easy to use and gentle on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. Schorr

customer_reviews.title: IT WORK VERY GOOD.
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THE PRODUCT VERY GOOD, AND HANDLE GOOD WHILE CLEANING MY FEET'S. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: babybrother

customer_reviews.title: faulty item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in July of 2019 and have used it approximately 6 times. I went to turn it on the other day and the items light activates but the motor does not. I have tried to recharge the item and it still does not work. There is no motor activation when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more dry cracked heels!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier and more effective than using a pumice stone. I get about 3 uses before I have to recharge. My feet have never been more smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Lovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described and so far I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the handful of times that I got to use it. I've charged it like you're supposed to. I had noticed with the last couple tries that it didn't last long at all before it would die again. This time after charging, it stopped working after a few seconds of use..it is completely dead. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Colby

customer_reviews.title: Grip and go get your smooth feet
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like it. It works great! Battery seems to go down so quickly. I charge it full every time after I take care of my feet. And then I don't need to worry about the battery while I use it for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, lightweight and super cute.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product, I work on my feet all day and this little gem softens my feet right up. The color is beyond adorable and the jewel is the cutest. Great product, totally satisfied! Definitely recommend this for price and performance.
customer_reviews.author: mark whitney

customer_reviews.title: Mediocrity
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really do much of anything.... I felt like I was going to break it while using it and my feet aren’t even that rough.. not sure how well it would work for people with worse feet than mine.
customer_reviews.author: AJSumm

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product, so far, I love it. I have used electric pedicure files for years.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this for a couple hours and I absolutely love it! I had pretty thick calluses on both my heels. Now they are gone! This machine has exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked the first time but the more you use it, the better. Was delivered charged yay
customer_reviews.author: Madlena

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Really does what it’s supposed to do, even on my husband’s rough feet. It makes such a difference! Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MS510

customer_reviews.title: Look for a corded callus remover
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product, it worked well for the first few months. Unfortunately it didn’t last long. At first the batteries started to need charging more frequently then after 6 months it stopped holding a charge. Very disappointing that it only worked for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Haeger

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the rest Most don't have a built in battery or USB charging, especially for the great quality and price..totally Awesome! The before and after speaks for itself..
customer_reviews.author: Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. You have to be careful not to apply too much pressure during application or it will stall the motor and burn it out.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Ellen Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Have good looking feet.
customer_reviews.text: Well I just bought this item and got it today, so i cant give a valid feedback response but it looks like it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Hampton

customer_reviews.title: My experience with this product
customer_reviews.text: This device broke for me. It worked for about 2 months, but when I plugged it in to charge one night, the grinder kept going and ground away at my bathroom counter. Now we have to replace the bathroom counter due to this product malfunctioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely impressed how well this works !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: one of the best presents I've ever bought myself....this works soooo great that I'm buying one for all my friends and family on their birthdays!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lhasa lover

customer_reviews.title: Really like this foot file
customer_reviews.text: This producted really helped me get my ugly cracked heels looking better for spring.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Callous remover
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the product . Doesn’t work as expected and my feet aren’t that bad either .
customer_reviews.author: LESLY

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It did everything I wanted it to do for me. I wear boots for work and I like to be barefoot but can’t always make it to a nail salon. This profit made my feet feel so soft. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katpgs

product_meta.title: MiroPure Electric Callus Remover, Professional Wet and Dry 100% Waterproof and 3X Powerful Pedicure Foot File for Dead Hard Cracked Skin, Coarse and Fine 2 Roller Heads and Cleaning Brush
feature_bullets: 【INSTANTLY SOFT and SMOOTH 】: Gently and effectively buffs away rough, dry feet and hard calloused skin effortlessly. Turn cracked heels into silky smooth ones with just one application. Show off your beauty now.

【IPX7 100% WATERPROOF】: Enjoy a perfect pedicure in the shower or in the bath tub. Recommend to wipe the water off the feet for a better result. This electric callus remover is certified IPX7 Waterproof. Safe to clean by running water or immerse in the water.

【USB FAST CHARGING】: No need to change out batteries. Simply recharge the cordless electric foot file with the provided USB charging cable for 1.5 ~ 2 hours to the full charge which can powerfully run continuously for about 80 minutes.

【3X POWERFUL MOTOR】: Refillable roller head spins 360 degrees for quick results on thick, calloused skin with no blades to cut into the skin. Safe and effective to remove dead skin in minutes. Fine and coarse roller head provided for delicate and rough grinding over the feet.

【ONE BUTTON OPERATION】: One button set is easy to operate for every one. Ergonomically shaped non-slip handle ensures a comfortable, secure grip wet and dry. Lightweight design makes it easy to carry for travel. 30 Days Money Back Guarantee and 1 Year Quality Warranty.
